00011 #include <vector>
00012 #include <queue>
00013 #include "../common/utils.h"
00014 #include "../common/switch.h"

00020

00022 
00023 class set_switch_handler
00024 {
00025   onoff_switch & switch_;
00026 public:
00027   set_switch_handler(onoff_switch & switch__):switch_(switch__) {}
00028         void operator() (request * req) { switch_.on(); }
00029 };
00030 
00035 template <typename block_type,typename bid_iterator_type>
00036 class block_prefetcher
00037 {
00038         block_prefetcher() {}
00039 protected:
00040         bid_iterator_type consume_seq_begin;
00041         bid_iterator_type consume_seq_end;
00042         unsigned seq_length;
00043         
00044         int * prefetch_seq;
00045                 
00046         unsigned nextread;
00047         unsigned nextconsume;
00048         
00049         const int nreadblocks;
00050                 
00051         block_type *read_buffers;
00052         request_ptr * read_reqs;
00053 
00054         onoff_switch * completed;
00055         int * pref_buffer;
00056         
00057         block_type * wait(int iblock)
00058         {       
00059                 START_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00060                 
00061                 #ifdef NO_OVERLAPPING
00062                 read_reqs[pref_buffer[iblock]]->poll();
00063                 #endif
00064                 
00065                 completed[iblock].wait_for_on();
00066                 END_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00067                 int ibuffer = pref_buffer[iblock];
00068                 assert(ibuffer >= 0 && ibuffer < nreadblocks );
00069                 return (read_buffers + ibuffer); 
00070         }
00071 public:
00078         block_prefetcher(
00079                         bid_iterator_type _cons_begin, 
00080                         bid_iterator_type _cons_end,
00081                         int * _pref_seq,
00082                         int _prefetch_buf_size
00083                         ):
00084                 consume_seq_begin(_cons_begin),
00085                 consume_seq_end(_cons_end),
00086                 seq_length(_cons_end - _cons_begin),
00087                 prefetch_seq(_pref_seq),
00088                 nextread(std::min(unsigned(_prefetch_buf_size),seq_length)),
00089                 nextconsume(0),
00090                 nreadblocks(nextread)
00091         {
00092     assert(seq_length > 0);
00093     assert(_prefetch_buf_size > 0);
00094                 int i;
00095                 read_buffers = new block_type[nreadblocks];
00096                 read_reqs = new request_ptr[nreadblocks];
00097                 pref_buffer = new int [seq_length];
00098                 
00099                 std::fill(pref_buffer,pref_buffer + seq_length,-1);
00100 
00101                 completed = new onoff_switch[seq_length];
00102                 
00103                 for (i = 0; i < nreadblocks; ++i)
00104                 {
00105       
00106                         assert( prefetch_seq[i] < int(seq_length));
00107       assert( prefetch_seq[i] >= 0 );
00108                         read_reqs[i] = read_buffers[i].read (
00109                                                                                 *(consume_seq_begin + prefetch_seq[i]),
00110                                                                                 set_switch_handler(*(completed + prefetch_seq[i])) );
00111                         pref_buffer[prefetch_seq[i]] = i;
00112                 };
00113     
00114         }
00117         block_type * pull_block()
00118         {
00119                 return wait(nextconsume++);
00120         }
00126         bool block_consumed(block_type * & buffer)
00127         {
00128                 int ibuffer = buffer - read_buffers;
00129                 read_reqs[ibuffer] = NULL;
00130                 
00131                 if (nextread < seq_length)
00132                 {
00133                         assert(ibuffer >=0 && ibuffer <nreadblocks);
00134                         int next_2_prefetch = prefetch_seq[nextread++];
00135                         
00136                         assert(next_2_prefetch <int(seq_length) && next_2_prefetch >= 0 );
00137                         assert( !completed[next_2_prefetch].is_on() );
00138                         
00139                         pref_buffer[next_2_prefetch] = ibuffer;
00140                         read_reqs[ibuffer] = read_buffers[ibuffer].read(
00141                                                                 *(consume_seq_begin + next_2_prefetch),
00142                                                                 set_switch_handler(*(completed + next_2_prefetch))
00143                                                         );
00144                 }
00145 
00146                 if (nextconsume >= seq_length)
00147                         return false;
00148 
00149                 buffer = wait(nextconsume++);
00150 
00151                 return true;
00152         }
00154         ~block_prefetcher()
00155         {
00156                 delete [] completed;
00157                 delete [] pref_buffer;
00158                 delete [] read_buffers;
00159                 delete [] read_reqs;
00160         }
00161   
00162 };
00163
